description: API for order buyer cancellation processing

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner unique identifier for all requests

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: Request unique identifier for all requests. Express unique orders by year

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The order identification used to handle business

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for once

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error type if the error. Empty if no error

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if the error. Empty if no message

parameters.name: status_time
parameters.description: The time when the order is updated
